item.title: 罗马尼亚就预算案发出乐观信号以平息市场波动
item.description: 罗马尼亚当局试图缓解投资者对该国政治危机的担忧，财政部长称预算在控制之中，央行正在管理货币压力。【原文：Romanian authorities sought so assuage investor fears about the country’s political crisis, with the finance chief saying the budget was under control and the central bank was managing pressures on the currency.】

item.title: <strong>针对铁杆玩家的关税大棒即将到来</strong
item.description:
一个行业是如何感受到后果的？【原文：

How one industry is already feeling the fallout.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：关税大棒向游戏玩家袭来（播客）
item.description: 每个行业都会以不同的方式受到贸易战的影响。在许多情况下，我们还不知道结果会如何。其他行业则受到直接影响。专门从事电脑游戏的公司高度依赖来自中国和其他东亚国家的投入。这些公司组装定制的游戏机和其他外围设备（相机、椅子、控制器、扬声器等）。斯蒂芬-伯克（Stephen Burke）是 Gamers Nexus 的创始人。【原文：Every industry is going to be affected by the trade war in different ways. In many cases, we don’t know how it’s going to play out. Other industries are seeing an immediate impact. Companies that specialize in computer gaming are highly reliant on inputs from China and other East Asian countries. These companies assemble customized gaming rigs and other peripherals (cameras, chairs, controllers, speakers etc.). On this episode, we’re joined by Stephen Burke, the founder of Gamers Nexus, a public】

item.title: 德国将取消对部分银行的环境、社会和公司治理规定，以减少繁文缛节
item.description: 德国金融监管局（BaFin）将豁免一些规模较小的银行遵守欧盟有关环境风险管理的规定，以削减日益被视为过高的报告要求。【原文：Germany’s financial watchdog BaFin will exempt smaller banks from some European Union rules governing environmental risk management as it seeks to cut reporting requirements increasingly seen as excessive.】

item.title: 现代汽车发布中国首款电动 SUV 以应对竞争
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co.）将推出首款专门针对中国市场的电池电动汽车，以应对本土竞争并扭转销售下滑的趋势。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. is set to launch its first battery electric vehicle specifically for the Chinese market as the carmaker seeks to counter local competition and reverse slumping sales.】

item.title: 日本 Zen-Noh 公司在日内瓦开展谷物贸易业务
item.description: 日本农业合作社 Zen-Noh 在瑞士成立了一家公司，开始在欧洲贸易中心开展业务。【原文：Japanese farming cooperative Zen-Noh has established a Swiss corporation to begin operations in the European trading hub.】

item.title: Vinpearl 将于下周作为越南最大股票之一亮相
item.description: Vinpearl JSC 是越南最大的私营商业帝国旗下的酒店管理部门，作为越南最大的上市公司之一，其股票将于下周开始交易。【原文：Shares of Vinpearl JSC, the hospitality unit of Vietnam’s largest private business empire, will begin trading next week as one of the country’s biggest listed companies.】

item.title: 阿克尔-英国石油公司首席执行官称，即使油价下滑，项目仍有竞争力
item.description: 阿克尔-英国石油公司（Aker BP）首席执行官卡尔-约翰尼-赫斯维克（Karl Johnny Hersvik）表示，该公司旨在推动 2030 年后产量增长的项目组合在油价下跌的情况下仍然具有竞争力。【原文：Aker BP Chief Executive Officer Karl Johnny Hersvik said the company’s portfolio of projects aimed at driving production beyond 2030 remain competitive in the face of falling oil prices.】

item.title: 业绩最佳的 Orbis 基金加倍持有日本股票
item.description: 今年，一家业绩最佳的全球股票基金将其在日本的投资额增加了一倍多，此举正值日元升值提振国内公司前景之际。【原文：A top-performing global equity fund has more than doubled its exposure to Japan this year, making the move just as a strengthening yen boosts the outlook for domestic companies.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行同意与 PGGM 达成 SRT 交易，涉及 20 亿美元贷款
item.description: 根据法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）和荷兰养老基金管理公司 PGGM 向彭博新闻社提供的一份声明，法国巴黎银行正在卸载其 20 亿美元贷款组合的部分信贷风险，将风险转移给荷兰养老基金管理公司 PGGM。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is offloading some of the credit risk it has from a $2 billion portfolio of loans, shifting the exposure to Dutch pension fund manager PGGM, according to a statement from the two firms provided to Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 据说马来西亚最大的国家基金将延续可交换债券销售计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚 Permodalan Nasional 有限公司正在考虑重启六年前曾探讨过的可交换债券销售计划，以筹集资金拓展海外市场。【原文：Malaysia’s Permodalan Nasional Bhd. is considering reviving an exchangeable bond sale that it had explored six years ago to raise funds to expand overseas, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 理事会主席称中美关税暂停是合理预期
item.description: 美中贸易全国委员会（US-China Business Council）主席肖恩-斯坦恩（Sean Stein）表示，美中两国官员本周晚些时候在瑞士举行的贸易谈判将导致两国关税缓和，人们对此期望很高。【原文：Expectations are high that trade talks between US and Chinese officials in Switzerland later this week will result in a tariff reprieve between the two nations, US-China Business Council President Sean Stein said.】

item.title: 中俄将停滞不前的天然气管道列入莫斯科会谈议程
item.description: 中国领导人习近平和俄罗斯总统普京本周的会谈将包括围绕连接两国经济的天然气管道项目进行谈判，该项目因在成本、路线和紧迫性等问题上存在分歧而阻碍多年。【原文：Talks between Chinese leader Xi Jinping and Russia’s Vladimir Putin this week will include negotiations around a much-delayed natural gas pipeline connecting the two economies, reviving discussions hampered for years by disagreements on the cost, route and urgency of the project.】

item.title: 菲律宾电子游戏收入首次超过赌场收入
item.description: 在菲律宾，电子游戏的收入首次超过了实体赌场的收入，标志着亚洲第二大赌博中心发生了转变。【原文：Revenue from electronic-games overtook those from brick-and-mortar casinos for the first time in the Philippines, marking a shift in Asia’s second-largest gambling hub.】

item.title: 在人工智能蓬勃发展之际，乐可兰看到了数据中心的 "出色 "增长
item.description: 由于人工智能的蓬勃发展带动了数据中心的 "出色 "增长，乐金公司（Legrand SA）第一季度的销售额超过了预期。【原文：Legrand SA’s first-quarter sales surpassed expectations as the artificial intelligence boom led to “outstanding” growth for data centers.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀出人意料，增幅低于预期
item.description: 瑞典上个月的基本通胀加速度低于预期，这很可能助长了瑞典央行将恢复宽松政策以帮助疲软经济的预期。【原文：Sweden’s underlying inflation accelerated less than expected last month, likely feeding expectations that the Riksbank will resume easing to aid the sluggish economy.】

item.title: 盐野义制药因 10 亿美元收购鸟居制药的报道而下跌
item.description: 在《日经新闻》报道日本制药商盐野义制药株式会社将以约 1,500 亿日元（10 亿美元）的价格收购鸟居制药株式会社后，该公司股价创下近一个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of Japanese drugmaker Shionogi & Co. dropped the most in almost a month after the Nikkei newspaper reported the company will buy Torii Pharmaceutical Co. for about ¥150 billion ($1 billion).】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前德国工厂订单增加
item.description: 德国 3 月份的工厂订单增幅超过预期，表明在美国宣布加征关税之前，情况有所改善，这给欧洲最大经济体的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：German factory orders rose more than predicted in March, signaling improvement in the run-up to the US tariff announcements that have clouded the outlook for Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 英国市场波动加剧押注英国央行将暂停债券销售
item.description: 投资者将在周四的货币政策会议上寻求有关英国央行未来债券销售计划的线索，因为市场猜测近期的市场动荡可能会促使官员们在今年晚些时候停止这一计划。【原文：Investors will seek clues over the future of the Bank of England’s bond-selling program at its monetary policy meeting on Thursday, amid speculation that recent market turmoil may encourage officials to cease it later this year.】

item.title: 比尔-盖茨与印度尼西亚领导人讨论公共卫生事业
item.description: 比尔-盖茨在与印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的会晤中讨论了在印尼开展公共卫生活动的计划，这位亿万富翁正努力扩大在亚洲的慈善活动。【原文：Bill Gates discussed plans to roll out public health initiatives in Indonesia in a meeting with President Prabowo Subianto as the billionaire seeks to expand philanthropic activity in Asia.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市创纪录的上涨势头将再次受到考验
分析师称印巴紧张局势有进一步升级的风险
item.description: 印度对巴基斯坦发动的有针对性的军事打击让分析家们对紧张局势进一步升级的可能性及其对各国经济和市场的影响展开了讨论。【原文：India’s targeted military strikes against Pakistan have left analysts debating the possibility of a further escalation in the tensions and its impact on the nations’ economies and markets.】

item.title: 炎热干燥的天气威胁中国小麦种植带的产量
item.description: 就在中国政府试图在与美国的贸易战中加强粮食安全之际，炎热干燥的天气正威胁着中国最主要种植区的小麦生产，有可能中断一种关键主食谷物的产量。【原文：Hot and dry weather is threatening wheat production in China’s top growing region, potentially disrupting output of a key staple grain just as Beijing attempts to bolster food security during a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 边境紧张局势升级，印度国防股票大涨 50 亿美元
item.description: 自两周前克什米尔发生游客惨遭袭击事件后，印度与邻国巴基斯坦之间的紧张局势升级，印度国防企业的市场估值增加了 50 多亿美元。【原文：Indian defense firms have added more than $5 billion in market valuation since tensions escalated between the country and neighboring Pakistan following a brutal attack on tourists in Kashmir two weeks ago.】

item.title: 与加拿大闹翻后，中国寻找新的动物饲料来源
item.description: 中国贸易商正在全球范围内寻找油菜籽的替代来源，因为中国与最大的油菜籽供应国加拿大之间的紧张关系有可能导致动物饲料中的一种关键成分进口受阻。【原文：Chinese traders are scouring the globe for alternative sources of rapeseed, as tensions with Canada, their top supplier, risk choking imports of a key ingredient in animal feed.】

item.title: 任正非称美元出逃将引发 2.5 万亿美元的外汇 "雪崩
item.description: 斯蒂芬-詹（Stephen Jen）认为，随着亚洲国家解除其世界储备货币库存，美元可能面临 2.5 万亿美元的 "雪崩式 "抛售。【原文：The dollar may face a $2.5 trillion “avalanche” of selling as Asian countries unwind their stockpile of the world’s reserve currency, according to Stephen Jen.】

item.title: 交易商评估巴基斯坦冲突影响，印度资产保持稳定
item.description: 印度股市扭转了早盘的跌势，而卢比则在印度周三早盘表示对巴基斯坦多个地点发动军事打击后走低，这表明投资者的目光可能已从地缘政治紧张局势转向关注贸易协议的前景。【原文：Indian stocks reversed early losses, while the rupee edged lower after the country said early Wednesday that it launched a military strike at several locations in Pakistan, indicating investors may be looking beyond geopolitical tensions to focus on prospects of trade deals.】

item.title: 台湾货币飙升加大经济改革压力
item.description: 台币自 1988 年以来最大幅度的飙升，以及持续升值的前景，引发了对亚洲最依赖出口的经济体之一彻底改革其增长模式的呼声。【原文：The Taiwan dollar’s most extreme surge since 1988, along with prospects for continued appreciation, has triggered calls for one of the most export-dependent Asian economies to overhaul its growth model.】

item.title: 宝莱坞和印度大银行的故乡面临越来越大的旋风风险
item.description:
即使破坏性风暴日益频繁，孟买仍然毫无准备，岌岌可危。【原文：

Mumbai remains perilously unprepared even as the devastating storms grow more frequent.

】

item.title: 非洲有争议的偏远角落正在为特朗普欢呼
item.description:
在美国承认摩洛哥对西撒哈拉地区的主权之后，西撒哈拉领土正在变成 "埃尔多拉多"。【原文：

The territory of Western Sahara is turning into an ‘El Dorado’ after the US recognized Morocco’s claim over the region.

】
